text:
Realm (YC S11) is hiring in San Francisco, Copenhagen and SOME REMOTE (remote only from some timezones / countries, see details below)

Realm is building a mobile database: a replacement for Core Data & SQLite. We’re by hundreds of millions of people already, and growing fast. We came out of YC in Summer 11 and have raised 29M so far from Khosla, a16z, SVAngel, Scale VP and many others.

We’re based in San Francisco, with an engineering office in Copenhagen, and remote employees distributed around the world.

We’re hiring for a wide range of positions including: iOS, OS X, Android, C++, JavaScript. .Net / C#, QA, Marketing, Evangelist, Product Manager and Technical Writer & Editor.

We have one remote job available at the moment, for Android Developer with NDK experience, which can be based out of most countries in Europe.

You can see all job details and apply on https://realm.io/jobs/ Or if you have any questions, I’m VP Product there and always happy to chat! tim@realm.io
